firstNews.description: BBC Sport looks at the big talking points from UFC 273 as Alexander Volkanovski beats the 'Korean Zombie' Chan Sung Jung to retain his featherweight title.
firstNews.author: Caroline Fox
firstNews.title: UFC 273: Five things we learned as Alexander Volkanovski dominates 'Korean Zombie'
firstNews.content:
Volkanovski earned a performance-of-the-night bonus for his win over Chan Sung Jung
Alexander Volkanovski cemented his status as the world's best featherweight with a flawless victory over the 'Koreâ€¦
